name: Dogs Go (itch)
description:
First part of the game? Driving (two-person wheelchair, forklift), city scene + prologue, ragdolls, etc.

What's next? Home scene, active ragdolls, etc.

CONTROLS
  • WASD/arrow keys to move
  • [Left Shift] to speed up
  • Mouse to rotate camera
  • [Tab] to switch between two players
  • [R] to pull the dog onto the seat
  • [Z] for the to-do list
  • [Esc] to pause the game
CREDITS

All credits for music and sound effects go to  Fesliyan Studios and Mixkit.

The wheelchair model is a modified version of Combat Wheelchair Base Model - Iron and Brass by Chaitanya Krishnan, licensed under Creative Commons Attribution.

Other assets used in this project include

  • Plastic Trash Bins
  • Low Poly Forklift
  • Playground Low Poly
  • Sherbb's Particle Collection
  • FREE Skybox Extended Shader
  • City Kit (Commercial), City Kit (Roads), Car Kit, Furniture Kit
DISCLAIMER

The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.
